adudecalledleo.lionutils.item

Class EnchantMapBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • adudecalledleo.lionutils.item.EnchantMapBuilder

  • public final class EnchantMapBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class for building a map of Enchantments to levels, for use with EnchantmentHelper.set(Map, ItemStack).
    Since:
    6.0.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      EnchantMapBuilder add(net.minecraft.enchantment.Enchantment enchantment, int level)
      Adds an enchantment-level pair entry of the specified enchantment and level to the builder.
      EnchantMapBuilder addMax(net.minecraft.enchantment.Enchantment enchantment)
      Adds an enchantment-level pair entry of the specified enchantment and its maximum level to the builder.
      EnchantMapBuilder addMin(net.minecraft.enchantment.Enchantment enchantment)
      Adds an enchantment-level pair entry of the specified enchantment and its minimum level to the builder.
      java.util.Map<net.minecraft.enchantment.Enchantment,java.lang.Integer> build()
      Builds the final Enchantments to levels map.
      static EnchantMapBuilder create()
      Creates a new EnchantMapBuilder.
      static java.util.Map<net.minecraft.enchantment.Enchantment,java.lang.Integer> of(net.minecraft.enchantment.Enchantment enchantment, int level)
      Creates a singleton map of Enchantments to levels containing the specified enchantment and level.
      static java.util.Map<net.minecraft.enchantment.Enchantment,java.lang.Integer> ofMax(net.minecraft.enchantment.Enchantment enchantment)
      Creates a singleton map of Enchantments to levels containing the specified enchantment and its maximum level.
      static java.util.Map<net.minecraft.enchantment.Enchantment,java.lang.Integer> ofMin(net.minecraft.enchantment.Enchantment enchantment)
      Creates a singleton map of Enchantments to levels containing the specified enchantment and its minimum level.
